item.title: Mora
item.description: Overview The Mora were a neolithic tribe of hunter-gatherer minikin native to Southern Tseireph. They spoke a language reconstructed as Proto-Morellic, and were the ancestors of Sarvara, Coroth, and Aqhor.

item.title: The Diiran Minikin
item.description: Overview The Diira were a Nethic tribe of minikin native to the Sarvaran River Basin in southern Tseireph, in the 2nd realm during the neolithic period.
